title: Wall Street Breakfast October 24: Philips New CEO Slashes Thousands Of Jobs
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Philips (PHG) new CEO starts by slashing thousands of jobs amid device recall woes. Tesla (TSLA) cuts prices in China amid softening demand. Volatility may make a comeback this week as Big Tech reports earnings. Learn more about these stocks with a free trial of Seeking Alpha Premium now.
